tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive contact information for suppliers including key personnel, departments, and communication channels.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs to retrieve contact information for

error_messages: Invalid supplier_ids: At least one valid supplier ID is required.
Invalid contact_types: Must include recognized types like 'sales', 'procurement', 'technical', 'executive', 'support', 'general'.
Contact information unavailable: Unable to retrieve contact details for some suppliers.
Data privacy restrictions: Some contact information restricted due to privacy settings.
usage: Provide supplier_ids array to retrieve contacts for. Optionally specify contact_types and set include_executives flag. Returns comprehensive contact information for business communication.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs with contact information

primary_emails.description: Primary email addresses for each supplier

phone_numbers.description: Main phone numbers for each supplier

contact_persons.description: Key contact person names and roles for each supplier
